detail_desc: Underwired balconette bikini top with padded cups, wide adjustable shoulder straps, double elasticated straps at the sides and a metal fastener at the back.
Boat-necked top in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with short raglan sleeves. Elasticated gathers at the sides for best fit over the tummy, and overlocked edges around the sleeves and hem.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets with a zip, and slim, tapered legs with cuffed hems.
Baby Exclusive. Polo-neck collar in soft, rib-knit wool.

Knee-length jumpsuit in soft slub cotton jersey with an opening and button at the back of the neck and short, frilled sleeves with a lace trim. Lace detail at the top of the front, a gathered seam at the waist, side pockets and straight legs.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.
Henley top in slub cotton jersey with a button placket, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Tights with a seam down the back of the legs. 30 denier.
Small shoulder bag in shimmering metallic imitation leather. Narrow adjustable shoulder strap and handle at the top, and two zipped compartments. Lined. Size 5.5x11x15 cm.
Short dress in taffeta. Straight cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps and a concealed zip in one side. Seam under the bust and at the waist for added width and soft draping. Lined at the top.

Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a grandad collar, button placket, gathers at the shoulders and a gathered yoke at the back. Long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Wide blouse in an airy cotton weave with a V-neck, 3/4-length sleeves with ties at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low, V-shaped waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Skinny-fit treggings in superstretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Short Tencel™ lyocell shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and short slits at the hems.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved all-in-one pyjamas in soft, printed organic cotton jersey with press-stud fastenings.
Felted wool beret. Unlined.
Lightly padded sleep bag in soft, patterned jersey with a jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.
Short skirt in a stretch weave with a concealed zip and slit. Lined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with an integral sports bra and low-cut back. Lined sports bra with an elasticated hem and an opening at the back with crossover straps.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and slim legs.

Fine-knit jumper and a bell-shaped skirt in a fine-knit, patterned cotton blend containing glittery threads. Jumper with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Skirt with an elasticated waist. Unlined.

KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Top in an airy, patterned viscose weave. Round neckline with a contrasting colour trim and small opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Flutter sleeves, and a gathered yoke front and back.
3/4-length leggings in sturdy, denim-look jersey with an elasticated waist and fake fly. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and short slits at the hems.

Short, padded jacket in woven fabric with a lined hood with a collar and drawstring, and a zip at the front. Flap side pockets with a press-stud, one inner pocket with a hook and loop fastener and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Polyester filling. Lined.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a slightly wider, raw-edge neckline, seam centre back and short, raw-edged sleeves. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Knee-length skirt in stretch twill made from a cotton blend with a high paper bag waist, detachable tie belt, buttons down the front and side pockets with a decorative flap and button. Unlined.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in airy silk with a sheen. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, spaghetti shoulder straps and a seam at the waist with pleats and a tie belt. Concealed zip at the back and straight, wide legs. Lined at the top.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Warm-lined, high profile Chelsea boots in imitation leather with an elastic gore at one side, a zip at the other and a loop at the back. Soft velour linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Trousers in a viscose weave with an elasticated waist, side pockets, slightly lower crotch and tapered legs.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim legs.
Sports joggers in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, taped details and side pockets. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees for extra mobility and wide ribbed hems.
Pyjama bottoms in soft flannel made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and wide, gently tapered legs.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved tops in ribbed, organic cotton jersey with a button placket and scalloped edges around the neckline and cuffs.
Loafers with rounded, slightly pointed toes, satin linings and imitation leather insoles.
Platform trainers with lacing at the front, cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform 3.5 cm.
Straight-cut coat with a soft, brushed finish, narrow notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and welt side pockets. Unlined.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and short slits in the hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with plastic studs at the top.
Sandals with narrow foot straps and a heel strap with covered elastication. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 1 cm.

Short dress in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck front and back, narrow ties at the top of the back, dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Gathered seam under the bust and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a print motif, opening and button at the back of the neck and a lace trim at the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Wide, high-waisted shorts in woven fabric with a sewn-in tie belt and pleats at the top. Fly with a concealed zip, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
5-pocket trousers in cotton twill in a regular fit with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud (button in sizes 8-10Y).
Boxy-style jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back in ventilating mesh and a wide elasticated hem. Medium support.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with fringing at the front, a zip at the top and a braided shoulder strap with a press-stud at one end. Lined. Size 15x18 cm.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, patterned, fine-knit viscose blend with a rounded collar in woven fabric and an opening with a button at the back of the neck.
Jeggings in washed, superstretch denim with a high waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Pleated top in soft jersey with a textured stripe and sheen. Straight-cut at the top in a wide, softly draping fit with wide shoulder straps.
Sports socks in a cotton blend.
Calf-length dress in soft, gently draping satin with a V-neck, wrapover front with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, tie belt at the waist and short, flared sleeves. Lined.
Sweatpants in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a button placket. Bottoms with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Straight-cut blouse in woven fabric. Round opening at the back with ties at the back of the neck and short, elasticated puff sleeves.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit, printed cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Double-breasted jacket in woven fabric made from a wool blend with notch lapels, welt front pockets with a flap, and long sleeves with buttons at the cuffs. Detachable tie belt at the waist and a single back vent. Lined.
Trousers in stretch twill with detachable braces. Adjustable elasticated waist with a press-stud, side pockets and fake back pockets. Adjustable, elastic braces with imitation leather details.
Wide sports top in fast-drying slub jersey made from a viscose and cotton blend with low dropped shoulders and short sleeves.

Block-coloured top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket and jersey-lined hood with a drawstring at the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shirt in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and skinny legs with sewn-in creases.
Trousers in washed stretch twill with a high waist, concealed zip in the side and slim legs.
Shorts in an airy linen and Tencel™ lyocell blend with a high waist and detachable tie belt. Zip fly, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Wide jumper in a soft chenille knit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Slightly longer at the back.

Outdoor jacket in a printed weave with a lined, detachable hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Elasticated drawstring at the waist, flap front pockets with a press-stud, and elasticated cuffs. Lined.
Cotton chambray trainers with imitation leather details, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Padded tongue and heels. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Knee-length shorts in a patterned cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a welt back pocket.
Calf-length dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Seam with pleats at the waist and short sleeves with narrow elastication and gathers. Unlined.
Dressing gown in soft fleece with a hood and detachable tie belt at the waist.
